name: Nasuni Storage
description: The extension allows users to interact with Nasuni storage

file_system_path.title: Storage Mount Path
file_system_path.description: The path to the place in file system where Nasuni share is mounted

exclude_folders.title: Exclude Folders
exclude_folders.description: The list of folders to exclude from access

log_destination.title: Log File Location
log_destination.description: The path to the file where logs will be stored. If not set then no logs are created.

max_scan_items.title: Max Scan Items
max_scan_items.description: The maximum number of items (files/folders) to scan in a folder.

max_return_file_size.title: Max Return File Size
max_return_file_size.description: The maximum size of a file to return by the server.

max_read_file_size.title: Max Read File Size
max_read_file_size.description: The maximum size of a file to read by the server.
